resources.string: The Pitch Component shows what is happening on the field in real time. For the implementation, it requires setting the height (in case its wrapped in a Constraint Layout), so the field can fit inside the component.

The Stats Component shows what is happening on the during the game in real time(e.g. Ball Possession). For the implementation, it requires setting the height (in case its wrapped in a Constraint Layout), so the stats can fit inside the component.

The Summary Component inflate a summary stats box and current show game statistics, such as number of red and yellow card, match goals, miss occasions, and much more.. For the implementation, it requires setting the height (in case its wrapped in a Constraint Layout), so the stats can fit inside the component.
The Swipe Component shows three components:Momentum, Pitch and Stats.
